sect2.title: Installation of Vulkan-Loader

note.para: If this package is being installed on a system where Mesa has already been installed previously, please rebuild Mesa after this package to install Vulkan graphics drivers.

sect2.para: Install Vulkan-Loader by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -D CMAKE_SKIP_RPATH=TRUE \ -D BUILD_WSI_WAYLAND_SUPPORT=OFF \ -G Ninja ..
ninja

sect2.para: This package does not come with a working test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -D BUILD_WSI_WAYLAND_SUPPORT=OFF: This option allows building the library without Wayland. If you want to build with Wayland, omit this option.

sect2.title: 32-bit Installation of Vulkan-Loader
sect2.para: Install lib32-Vulkan-Loader by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
ASFLAGS=--32 CFLAGS=-m32 CXXFLAGS=-m32 \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib32/pkgconfig \ cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -D CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib32 \ -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -D CMAKE_SKIP_RPATH=TRUE \ -D BUILD_WSI_WAYLAND_SUPPORT=OFF \ -G Ninja ..
ninja
DESTDIR=$PWD/DESTDIR ninja install cp -vr DESTDIR/usr/lib32/* /usr/lib32 rm -rf DESTDIR ldconfig
